About

Who am I?

Hi, I'm Andy.

Programmer. Pianist. Walking, talking IMDB. Traveller. Wannabe 80's keytar rockstar.

Born in Newcastle-upon Tyne, Tyne and Wear - currently living in Farnham, Surrey. '14 Graduate of Newcastle University.

Addicted to technology, podcasts, travelling, Icelandic music, world food, TV & film, anything sport.

Current top artists:

Seeking new and interesting opportunities, to network with other like-minded individuals, and to explore and develop my interests.
